name: Maarten van Walstijn
content: Business Card | School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Queen's University Belfast Top Business Card Dr. Maarten Van WalstijnPhD Senior Lecturer E-mail: Phone: +44 (0)28 9097 4842 Research Profile: pure.qub.ac.uk/en/persons/maarten-van-walstijn Room: G020Sonic Arts and Computer Science Research Centre PostalAddress: Sonic Arts and Computer Science Research Centre, Cloreen Park, Belfast Research Interests: Time-domain modelling of musical instruments Numerical modelling of acoustic spaces Measurement and processing of musical instrument signals Research Clusters:   Energy, Power and Intelligent Control School & University Responsibilities:   Stage 4 Coordinator External Activities: Session chair for the 12th International Conference on Digital Audio Effects (DAFx 2009) Paper chair of the International Computer Music Conference (ICMC) 2008 Session chair for the 11th International Conference on Digital Audio Effects (DAFx 2008) Further particulars: Within the School of Music and Sonic Arts: Member of Sonic Arts research cluster Lecturing: Computational Acoustics (MUS7016) Signals, Sounds, & Senses (MUS7080) Meet Our People © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures Information Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Manage cookies
